post.body: did you get my reply?
did you get that?
need to have a more serene ,patient, pic
Didn't mean that I slept in switch, stayed awake during service got home then slept late......btw hidef projector would be nice
watched services from switch with Madge ,very intimate setting, enjoyed greatly! slept in as well whoo whoo!!
new blog post /Christmas service tonight/Price is Right soon / more cleaning/ WOW!!!!!!
Christmas Party season.......
preparing for early day returning and dogs freezing and house cleaning and God willing!
see if safari will tweet as of yet.....drum roll please
I can tweet from a phone, but not from 1 of 5 pcs how special!
I like highlandnews sorta like the info team online @lucyreid!
BTY time machine reformatted new hard drive NOT a good thing backup took longer AND caused a few ;(
WHEW!!!!..........chilly outside tonight get plants in
backing up bigmac

Seeing seven pounds with Madge yea!
my dog just helped herself to the kitty treat (litter) box ; has sprinles all over her nose,....gross
just finished feeding the masses at Highlands (not COH) forgot jacket and had to make two trips BAD for carpooler
gives "pretty in pink" a new face.:)
sorry double post due to much traffic and excitement of Mama Mia!
